abstract: Amalgamated, which works for marketers like Ben & Jerry’s, CarMax, Coca-Cola, MSG Networks and Qdoba Mexican Grill, is hiring Brian Martin as chief executive, succeeding Charles Rosen.
snippet: Amalgamated, which works for marketers like Ben & Jerry’s, CarMax, Coca-Cola, MSG Networks and Qdoba Mexican Grill, is hiring Brian Martin as chief executive, succeeding Charles Rosen.
lead_paragraph: A NEW YORK agency that changed hands last year is bringing in a new chief executive in a bid to spur further growth.

headline.main: Amalgamated Hires a New Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: Amalgamated Hires a New Chief Executive
